Title: HIIâ€™s Ingalls Shipbuilding Celebrates Apprentice School Graduates
Summary: Ingalls Shipbuilding, a division of HII, celebrated the graduation of its latest class of apprentices, who completed a 3-4 year program combining classroom instruction and hands-on shipbuilding experience. The event recognized the hard work and dedication of the graduates, who will contribute to the company's shipbuilding legacy.
